title: Argentina
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,048 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 790L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and X
description: Send your students on an adventure through the second-largest country in South America: Argentina. They will love learning about the amazing history, culture, and people.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
